09-26-2024: - {{HeroIcon|Hero=Infernus|Size=20}} Infernus will no longer appear in every bot match

09-01-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash now has 30% Slow Resistance
08-29-2024: - Reduced vertical reach on {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash dps
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash speed is now affected by slows
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash trail now gets wider with Ability Range bonus
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash T1 duration reduced from 7s to 6s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Catalyst|Size=20}} Catalyst Damage Amplification reduced from 30% to 25%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Catalyst|Size=20}} Catalyst T3 Damage Amplification increased from +10% to +15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Catalyst|Size=20}} Catalyst T2 reduced from +20% Lifesteal to +15%
08-15-2024: - Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Infernus|Size=20}} Infernus tracer, muzzle, and impact fx revisions for better performance
08-01-2024: - Fixed various bugs with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Infernus|Size=20}} Infernus that caused significant lag
- Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Infernus|Size=20}} Infernus being unable to slide out of {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Afterburn|Size=20}} Afterburn base DPS reduced from 18 to 15
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Afterburn|Size=20}} Afterburn T3 DPS reduced from 33 to 30
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Afterburn|Size=20}} Afterburn spirit scaling increased from 0.4 to 0.5
07-18-2024: - Fixed a bug where {{HeroIcon|Hero=Infernus|Size=20}} Infernus could get stuck in his {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash pose
- Fixed a speed exploit with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Infernus|Size=20}} Infernus {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash
06-27-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Afterburn|Size=20}} Afterburn base dps reduced from 20 to 18
06-20-2024: - Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash duration not being affected by duration extender
06-06-2024: - {{HeroIcon|Hero=Infernus|Size=20}} Infernus's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Afterburn|Size=20}} Afterburn now shows portraits of enemies that are burning for the full duration
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash cooldown increased from 30s to 38s

- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash T1 duration reduced from 8s to 7s
